hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh

Class IndexedTriangleStripImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh.AbstractIndexedTriangleStrip
      • hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh.IndexedTriangleStripImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexedTriangleMesh, IndexedTriangleStrip, PointList, TriangleMesh, TriangleStrip

    public class IndexedTriangleStripImpl
extends AbstractIndexedTriangleStrip
implements IndexedTriangleStrip
    An implementation of IndexedTriangleStrip which stores the points in a list, and stores the strips as lists of point indices.
    Author:
    Kaz√≥ Csaba

    • Constructor Detail

      • IndexedTriangleStripImpl

        public IndexedTriangleStripImpl(List<Vector3> points,
                        List<int[]> strips)
        Creates a new instance with the specified data. Both lists will be stored by reference. No further operations on these objects should be performed.
        Parameters:
        points - the points of the mesh
        strips - the triangle strips specified by point index arrays
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either argument or an element of either list is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if an array in the triangle list has a length less than 3, or if the strip list is empty
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if a point index is out of range

        public PointList getStrip(int index)
        Description copied from interface: TriangleStrip
        Returns the points of the specified strip.
        Specified by:
        getStrip in interface TriangleStrip
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the strip to return
        Returns:
        the points of the specified strip, containing at least three points. Each three consecutive points form a triangle (i.e. points (0, 1, 2), points (1, 2, 3) etc.).
